name: Weather App
description: An app that uses a third party api to find the weather. It also gives a 5 day forecast

name: Dance Helper
description: A site to help educate people about dance, and share my biased opinions about them.

name: QuikCode Pro
description: A React App that saves and stores code snippets using Mongo. It makes API calls and even has funny jokes on the bottom.

description: Like Playing 'Rock Paper Scissors'? Now You Can Play 'Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock'

name: QuikCode
description: The original version of Quik Code Pro. It was made with MySQL and JQuery

name: React Employee
description: An example of an employee directory using React. It allows you to search and filter employees how you wish.
